score.rules:
Plankton has finally gotten his chance to get his Revenge! Complete the shots and hit the LOCK to steal Neptune’s Crown, enact Plan Z and win big points!

CONTROLS
DOWN ARROW: Hold down to build power and release to launch the ball.
SHIFT: Left Flipper
CONTROL: Right Flipper
SPACE BAR: Bump the table.

RULES
String together ramp and orbit shots to score COMBOS.

To STEAL THE FORMULA , complete the KRABS targets three times, then head for the jet bumpers. The more you hit, the more points you get per pop.

To HIRE THE HITMAN, shoot past the biker and into the left chute. Hit it three times for bonus points.

To enact PLAN Z, hit the right side chute three times to open all the gates. If you hit a chute again in either direction, the ball will go all the way around for bonus points.

To activate MIND CONTROL, hit the left ramp three times and get a bonus jackpot.

Start all the EVIL PLOTS at the same time for PLANKTON’S REVENGE, all points on the table are doubled.

Complete all the plots to light the LOCK. Shoot the crown to lock a ball. Complete the plots again to light MULTIBALL. Shoot the crown again to start multiball.

Bonus points are awarded at the end of every ball based on COMBOS and TOTAL PLOTS.
